Top 5 Reasons Why Single-Insurer Private Exchanges are a Strategic Sales Channel
By GetInsured|Tuesday, October 15, 2013
Weve been powering private exchanges since 2006 and have seen firsthand how this strategic channel can give consumers more choice, help employers control costs and drive incremental business for our insurer clients.
Now with the opening of public exchanges were seeing more demand than ever from health plans who want to offer their own branded private insurance exchange, either as an alternative or complementary go-to-market channel. Why? Here are our top 5 reasons:
